meanings.sent1: The children were so zappy after playing in the park all day.
meanings.sent2: The party was zappy with music and laughter.
meanings.sent3: The zappy puppy chased its tail around the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her zappy personality lit up the room like a bright light.
meanings.sent5: The zappy colors of the fireworks painted the night sky.

meanings.sent1: The zappy alarm clock woke me up abruptly.
meanings.sent2: The zappy whistle pierced through the noisy crowd.
meanings.sent3: The zappy bird chirped loudly outside my window.
meanings.sent4: The zappy sound of the fire alarm made everyone evacuate quickly.
meanings.sent5: The zappy microphone feedback startled the audience.

meanings.definition: Quick and lively in movement or action
meanings.sent1: The zappy squirrel darted across the yard in a flash.
meanings.sent2: The zappy dancer moved gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent3: The zappy cat pounced on the toy mouse with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The zappy athlete sprinted towards the finish line with determination.
meanings.sent5: The zappy car zoomed down the road with speed.
